name: @helios-lang/compiler
description: Helios is a Domain Specific Language that compiles to Plutus-Core (i.e. Cardano on-chain validator scripts). Helios is a non-Haskell alternative to Plutus. With this library you can compile Helios scripts and build Cardano transactions, all you need to build 100% client-side dApps for Cardano.
author: Christian Schmitz

scripts.prebuild: node ./src/index.js && npx tsc --outFile ./helios-internal.d.ts && node ./utils/strip-internal.js && npx tsc --noEmit --target es2020 ./helios.d.ts
scripts.test: npm run test:pretty && npm run test:types && npm run test:suite
scripts.pub: node ./utils/check-version.js && aws s3 cp ./helios.js s3://helios-library/$(node ./utils/latest-version.js)/ && npm publish .
